text:
You wake up in a white hospital room.

"Ok Kid, it's very important that you don't freak out right now. My name is Agent Farley, and I'm the man who's going to get you out of this mess. You got hit by a van going 95 miles per hour through a red light. You should be dead, but instead, you're here in the hospital staring at me with that dumb look on your face. This place is not safe for you. You have... changed, and now very dangerous people are after you. I'm going to check outside. I'll be right back, try and get a feel for your new bod, you may need to use it soon."

subcategories.name: Gender
subcategories.text: You look down and see that you are now a...

options.label: Male
options.description: You have the body and squishy bits of a guy. Try to avoid getting kicked in the balls.

options.label: Female
options.description: You have the squishy bits of a girl. You are now one of the first people let off sinking ships.

options.label: Something Else
options.description: Good luck figuring this one out.

subcategories.name: Age
subcategories.text: Additionally, you feel different, like a younger or older self, you're a...

options.label: Teen
options.description: People will hesitate to shoot you, hopefully

options.label: Young Adult
options.description: Generally the best, most athletic age for superheroing

options.label: Middle Aged
options.description: Great for dad bods and milfs.

options.label: Elderly
options.description: Who would ever hit a grandparent?

subcategories.name: Body
subcategories.text: Your body is in a different shape than you remember, its

options.label: fit
options.description: You look like an Olympic athelete. Toned, strong, and nimble

options.label: regular
options.description: You look relatively normal. No massive muscles or missing fat.

options.label: Skinny
options.description: You look pretty small, like you need a sandwich or something.

options.label: Wide
options.description: You've got a bit of meat on your bones. Could be anywhere from chubby to obese.

options.label: beefy
options.description: You are now very, very muscley. This has little bearing on ability, but it is intimidating.

options.label: Built Different
options.description: You look strange or deformed, though probably more effective in some ways.

subcategories.name: Hair Length
subcategories.text: Your hair is

options.label: Gone
options.description: You're bald, intimidating

options.label: Buzzed
options.description: You look straight out of boot camp.

options.label: Short
options.description: Practical and pretty, a good choice

options.label: Long
options.description: A little less practical, but very stylish.

options.label: Very Long
options.description: Not practical, but pretty cool

subcategories.name: Hair Color
subcategories.text: And you are a

options.label: Brunette
options.description: Common, but certainly cute

options.label: Blonde
options.description: Less common and arguably more cute. You might get called an airhead.

options.label: Ginger
options.description: Frequently found with freckles and poor weather.

options.label: Something Else
options.description: Any other natural or unnatural hair color.

subcategories.name: Difficulty
subcategories.text:
Agent Farley suddenly returns to you carting a wheelchair. "Alright kid, time to hit it. The coast is clear for now and we have got to go. Get in the chair and lets skedaddle." 

After you slowly clamber into the chair, you feel a sharp pain on your neck and the world slowly drifts into darkness. "Sorry kid, can't have you know where we are going, national security and all that." 

You slowly wake up in a dark interrogation room, with a new pair of jeans and a Spectacularman t-shirt on and with Agent Farley across from you. "Oh, look who's finally awake. Once again, sorry for the shot, but the base you're at right now must remain top secret. I'm an agent for the Central super agency, and you're now a super. When the van slam into you on the street, you were turned into a fine, red mist, but fortunate for you, the van carried several doses of super serum they probably combined with their corpse and reform your body into what it currently is. This was pretty well documented, and it's a suspected several super villains were on their way before I extracted you, so, you're welcome. Besides the obvious differences to your body, you have already noticed, you will also probably develop power in the next several months, as well as new changes to your personality. The CSA won't leave you to suffer on your own, though, we plan to put you in a loving foster family or a job and to provide help and protection, so you can turn into a brave CSA agent or useful vigilante. First, though, we need to find out what power you will develop. Look at the sheet and see what calls out to you.

Farley slides some important documents in front of you, and indicates that you should read them.

options.label: Spectacularman Mode
options.description: You have 200 points to spend

options.label: Dakest Knight (Recommended)
options.description: You have 100 points to spend

options.label: Aquahombre Mode
options.description: You have 50 points to spend

options.label: Normie Mode
options.description: You have 0 points to spend

subcategories.name: Superpowers
subcategories.text: Unless requirements or exclusivity stated, everything is possible

options.label: Social
options.description: You may have been an anti-social basement dweller before, but soon you will instinctively be more personable and friendly.

options.label: Witty
options.description: You will soon be able to effectively communicate with the press and come with one-liners and quotes on the spot.

options.label: Charismatic
options.description: You can effectively start cults and convince a Jew that Hitler was a hero.

options.label: Strong Brain
options.description: You will soon more easily pick up on attempts at mind control directed at you or your friends.

options.label: Smart
options.description: You can make your own gadgets and useful tools, though it takes time, and you're no genius, just clever.

options.label: Einstein
options.description: You can effectively make your own Iron Man suit and figure out complex science.

options.label: Improviser
options.description: You can effectively bullshit your way out of lots of situations. Great on its own, amazing when paired with something like smart.

options.label: Sneaky
options.description: You will blend into the shadows, naturally disappearing and moving on silent feet. You won't be invisible, but you might as well be in the dark.

options.label: Master of One
options.description: We will train you to be an expert with any one weapon you choose.

options.label: Jack of All Trades
options.description: we will train you to be proficient with multiple weapons and combat styles. That's very useful for any aspiring hero.

options.label: Faster
options.description: You're not the Blink, but you will run and do simple tasks much faster than average. More useful than you might think.

options.label: Stronger
options.description: You're not the Bulk, but you will soon be significantly stronger than your average person. You can lift more, move faster with weight on your back, and pull yourself out of tough spots.

options.label: Better Healing
options.description: You can now recover from minor or even major injuries faster. This covers everything from paper cuts to ACL tears.

options.label: Amazing Healing
options.description: You can now recover from even mortal wounds with a little rest.

options.label: Physically Talented
options.description: Like Black Mantis, you can use your body and skills of seduction to get almost anything you want.

options.label: Super Soldier
options.description: You now have everything you need to be a perfect soldier. You are fast, tireless, and strong. You could go in a lot of different directions with this, and it might be one of the best powers you can get from this serum.

options.label: Healing Others
options.description: You now have a method of your choice that you can use to heal others. This typically works better when closer although not always.

options.label: Telekinesis
options.description: You can move things with your mind, up to a certain weight limit. It's difficult but you can get better with practice.

options.label: Telepathy
options.description: You can now read and communicate with only your mind. You can even influence emotions or send images. A good superpower, but better used behind the lines.

options.label: Animal Powers
options.description: A broad power, you have the abilities of some animal, like platypus man for example. You may also begin to look more like an animal.

options.label: Mimic
options.description: You can temporarily absorb and use other people's powers. You kind of have to rely on your teammates. Can last up to a day.

options.label: Amplifier
options.description: A very useful power for any superhero team, however, you are often the squishiest member and most appealing target for any supervillain since the amplifier doesn't help you.

options.label: Invisibility
options.description: Extremely useful for any stealthy hero or a pervert.

options.label: Paralyzer
options.description: You will grow or obtain an appendage or ability to paralyze people. When combined with animal powers, could be something like a scorpion tail.

options.label: Elemental
options.description: You will obtain power over some element: Stone, water, fire, or something else

options.label: Perceptive
options.description: Your senses are now cranked up to 11. Sight, hearing, touch. You can have 1 or more. Can be inconvenient (flashbangs)

options.label: Mind Control
options.description: You can now overpower and dominate other minds. Good for interrogations and other things.

options.label: Flight
options.description: You can now fly. Saves a lot on travel costs and great for mobility in combat.

options.label: Prediction
options.description: You will see the future, but it will be confusing and terrifying. Maybe more trouble than it's worth.

options.label: Youth
options.description: You will look 20 in your 40s. Doesn't extend your life, and won't work indefinitely, but still a great benefit.

options.label: Size Control
options.description: Can shrink, grow, or both on command. Can be applied to specific body parts.

options.label: Tough
options.description: You are built different. You can take a hit from a 250lb linebacker and walk it off. Very useful for any superhero.

options.label: Super Speed
options.description: You are now at least as fast as the Beam. Extremely useful for combat, or if you need to win a race.

options.label: Super Strength
options.description: You are now at least as strong as the Bulk. Extremely useful for combat, or if you need to move a couch.

options.label: Invulnerable
options.description: You are almost as unkillable thanks to your Spectacularman like skin. You have to pick a weakness though, like Kryptonite. Try to keep it a secret.

options.label: Laser Eyes
options.description: You can shoot lasers out of your eyes: Decently useful, but villains will target your eyes, which can hurt, a lot.

options.label: Time Stop
options.description: You can stop time at will. Very powerful but very straining and risky. You may go insane.

options.label: Claws
options.description: You can reveal claws out of your hands like Badger, or they can could more catlike, like sharp fingernails.

options.label: Magical
options.description: You are now capable of learning how to do magical things. This is very difficult, but the CSA has several teachers to help.

options.label: Artistic
options.description: You now have some artistic ability, be it singing, painting, sculpting, or anything else.

options.label: Magnetism
options.description: Allows you to manipulate metals with your mind. Telekinesis only with more power, but only with metal.

options.label: Phermones
options.description: You can naturally emit pheromones into the air that distract enemies and arouse.

options.label: Martial Master
options.description: You are a master of all things in hand to hand combat. We will personally train you, but it will be difficult.

options.label: Linguist
options.description: We will train you to be a master in up to five languages of your choosing. Very useful in every day and superhero life.

options.label: Animal Friend
options.description: You will have a special connection with a certain group of animals. It could be fish, mammals, spiders, or anything else. You will be able to speak to them and sometimes control them.

options.label: Chore Master
options.description: You are better at some household task, be it doing homework, cooking, doing laundry, cleaning, or anything else. Can be taken multiple times.

options.label: True Artist
options.description: You can make anything your draw come to life. It doesn't have to be a great drawing, but it does have to be recognizable.

options.label: Siren Song
options.description: Your singing and music can hold people in place, or get them to do your bidding if they are exposed long enough.

options.label: Sleepless
options.description: You no longer need to sleep at night. This is pretty useful, but it can also be very lonely. You have so much time and nobody to spend it with.

options.label: Teleportation
options.description: An even better form of travel than flight, teleportation can put you anywhere within a mile radius. For 100 points, your range is no extended across the country. You can effectively travel the world by stringing teleports.

options.label: Switch
options.description: You can now switch genders and appearance at will. Amazing for disguises.

options.label: Beauty Ready
options.description: You know how to diet or apply makeup to make yourself look good

options.label: Guiltless
options.description: Most would feel slightly bad after a murder or betrayal, but for you, it's as easy as doing dishes or walking the dog.

options.label: Hair Care
options.description: Your hair, both on your head and body is now mostly self managed. You won't need to shave your legs or style your hair as much now.

options.label: No Periods
options.description: You won't have periods anymore if you're a girl, and actually most bodily functions will be more efficient even for guys.

options.label: Stylish
options.description: Everything you do has a certain flare. You don't do it intentionally, but it attracts attention, from both good and evil.

options.label: Easy to Blend
options.description: Where others have to keep their secret identities with kits and careful prep, you can do it with a pair of glasses.

options.label: Unbreakable
options.description: There is something inside you that just refuses to give up. A spark that refuses to die. Allows you to crack jokes in combat and fight mind control to save friends.

options.label: Gaseous
options.description: You can turn yourself into a gas or it goes like for my will. This allows you to infiltrate almost anywhere. Regular clothes do not come with you, outfit coming with you is optional.

options.label: Technominded
options.description: You can interface with technology in ways nobody else can. Allows you to actually walk around the Internet or code programs in seconds.

options.label: Tactical Knowledge
options.description: You were already trained in weapons, but now we will train you in when and how to use them effectively.

options.label: Vehicle
options.description: You have your own vehicle of your own choosing. (Design it later)

options.label: Biological
options.description: All your powers come from your own body, can be gross, like shooting webs out of your wrist.

options.label: Gadgetize
options.description: Your powers come from technology combined with your body. Other people may be able to use it, but not as effectively.

options.label: Something Else
options.description: We don't even know what your power will be, but it's sure to be interesting.

options.label: Sidekick
options.description: Your body spit into two when the serum combined with your corpse, and the result was another person. Pay through the CYOA again, this time playing with -50 points you cannot select sidekick again. This second you will accompany you wherever you go and help you.

subcategories.name: Drawbacks
subcategories.text: "Ok kid. you got it all figured out? Good, because I have got some bad news for you. You're probably going to experience some unfortunate changes soon, like puberty, but worse.

options.label: ugly
options.description: You''re going to get more and more ugly as time goes on, and you already don't look great..

options.label: Puberty 2
options.description: You are going to get puberty again, and it's going to suck even more this time. Hormones don't mix well with powers.

options.label: Sleepy
options.description: You are going to need about 12 hours of sleep to feel rested from now on. Try not to pass out in an unfortunate place.

options.label: Compulsive Thief
options.description: You have a tendency to take anything shiny. Not a real heroic trait, but it can be overcome with effort.

options.label: Greedy
options.description: You always struggle to turn down easy work. You are more inclined to charge more or do certain favors for money.

options.label: Arrogant
options.description: You see yourself as above regular humans, and cannot help but show this in interviews and on the scene. This does not help your image, and many people would like to put you in your place.

options.label: Fragile
options.description: You are pretty weak and easy to break. Not great if you want to fight crime or to contact sports, but typically fine if you're a backline player.

options.label: Cowardly
options.description: You hesitate before going into combat or run when faced with a strong enemy. You may be able to overcome it if you're friends are in danger, but this is difficult and rare.

options.label: Clumsy
options.description: You fumble on important plays, drop plates, rip your clothes, and are a general danger with anything fragile in your hand

options.label: OCD
options.description: You cannot leave a job unfinished. Sounds great for studying and work, but in practice, you are obsessive and constantly stressed to the point of hurting your friends.

options.label: ADHD
options.description: Good luck in school or at work without a shitload of adderall, At least you will live a less stressful life but you will be much less effective.

options.label: Always Ready
options.description: You will always be 100% ready to go. Sounds fun until you need to stand up in front of a crowd.

options.label: Never Ready
options.description: The opposite problem, you'll always need viagra or you're going to be as dry as the sahara. Arguably worse of a problem.

options.label: Tiny
options.description: Your assets are on the smaller side. Kind of embarrassing.

options.label: Back Pain
options.description: Stop smiling, you think this is great? Enjoy having a hard time finding clothes or moving around in your later years. Also reduces combat effectiveness. Yes, this will impact both men and women by increasing your assets to such a size that it will cause back pain

options.label: Emotional Powers
options.description: Your powers become more powerful as you lose more and more control. If you are not careful, you could hurt lots of friends when you lose control. It's a fine line between control and chaos and you have to master it.

options.label: Character Flaw
options.description: You have numerous character defects that are very hard to overcome. You can't pick some copout shit like "too nice" either, you've got to be an asshole about it. Can be taken multiple times.

options.label: Cool Robot Limbs
options.description: Sounds fun, isn't that really great. It's awkward to take showers, wipe your ass, among other things. Overall, a hindrance that makes you more useful in combat.

options.label: No Prosthetic
options.description: An even more advanced version of this drawback. You're missing a limb, but there's no cool robot bit. You just get basic prosthetics that regular amputees get.

options.label: Dumb
options.description: You're going to lose more and more of your wits. Good luck.

options.label: Asocial
options.description: It will now be significantly harder for you to make friends. Makes team ups more difficult.

options.label: Nerdy
options.description: Some people can pull being smart and cool. Like Tony Stark. You cannot.

options.label: Dominant
options.description: Both in private and on the field, you strive to be the boss. Can lead to butting heads with other heroes.

options.label: Submissive
options.description: You are never the leader in a team, or the one who wears the pant in the relationship.

options.label: Four Eyes
options.description: You have to wear contacts or glasses. Can be expensive but makes you look smart.

options.label: Targetable
options.description: You are seen as an easy or valuable target, so bad guys will target you more.

options.label: Cute
options.description: You look cute, an advantage in normal life, but people will take you less seriously, and you might get targeted.

options.label: Hot
options.description: Like cute, but more intense.

options.label: The weak should fear the strong
options.description: You know you are above humans, and you cannot help but flaunt it everywhere you go. You will piss people off a lot, and will not be able to manage a secret identity. Do not get captured. They will try to humble you.

options.label: Ideological
options.description: You are now like an average Twitter extremist, and you will never be able to stop talking about your political ideology.

options.label: Revolutionary
options.description: You are now always looking to start a revolution with your powers. Expect to be very unpopular and hated by the government. The CSA itself may track you down.

options.label: Dull
options.description: You're kind of boring. You just don't shine like other supers do. I guess that makes it easier to blend in with people, but at what cost.

options.label: Unfunny
options.description: Much like the author of this CYOA, you cannot land a successful joke but will never stop trying. Enjoy examining your soul in silence after you say a line.

options.label: Stubborn
options.description: Compromise is for losers, and you don't lose. Can make working with a team very difficult, especially if people on that team are just as stubborn as you are.

options.label: No Killing
options.description: You have a strict moral code that requires that you directly kill no one.

options.label: Mentally Ill
options.description: You have some mental illness like autism or paranoia.

options.label: Bloodthirsty
options.description: You are far from above killing, and in fact, you will actively try to kill your opponents. Media might label you as brutal.

options.label: Creeper Attractor
options.description: Creeps seem to hover around you. You can still have normal relationships but thieves and supervillains will develop crushes or obsessions with you more often.

options.label: Demonized
options.description: "He was a thief" A criminal! He's a menace to the entire city!" The media will always portray you at your worst, even when you don't deserve it. People may still like you, but the elites wont.

options.label: Hunted
options.description: "If we can get a picture of Julia Roberts in a thong, then we can certainly get a picture of this weirdo!" The media will always be hunting for you or for your secret identity if you have one. Don't let the paparrazzi within mask grabbing range.

options.label: Thick Accent
options.description: You have a very thick accent from a region of your choice. Can help you blend in or stick out.

options.label: Lone Wolf
options.description: You can never really join a team. You can do occasional collabs or even be an honorary member but you will never be a main team player.

options.label: Pack Animal
options.description: You can never not be apart of a team. Everything you try to do on your own inevitably fails.

options.label: Fair to a fault
options.description: You are obsessed with balance and fairness to the point of hurting people to set scores even.

options.label: Kryptonite
options.description: You are some other heroes kryptonite. Supervillains will target you to get to them. Expect lots of kidnapping attempts if your secret identity is known.

options.label: Bring it on
options.description: There is no such thing as retreat in your mind. You will die on every hill unless physically pulled away by your team.

options.label: Public Servant
options.description: A senator is after you for some reason. For example, it could be someone wanting to exploit your powers for the government. Either way, watch out, Senators play dirty.

options.label: Chastity
options.description: Your powers are reliant on you being chaste for long periods of time. You could let off some steam every once in a while, but this is risky with villains who may target such a weakness.

options.label: Virginity Restoration
options.description: Your hymen recovers every night while you sleep. Sounds great but after the second time, it will start to become inconvenient.

options.label: Poor Choice
options.description: You cannot help but make bad fashion choices You will almost never look good unless someone else picked your clothes for you. Probably have a friend design your suit.

options.label: Sensitive Balls
options.description: Your balls are even more sensitive than an average guy's. Getting kicked there feels like having an anvil going at terminal velocity slam your balls into another anvil that is also going at terminal velocity.

options.label: Weird Fetish
options.description: You now have some strange and disgusting fetish. You better make sure your significant other really likes you before mentioning this.

options.label: Looking for a challenge
options.description: You will constantly seek out a worthy opponent to face you, and you will almost always come up short. Sounds great, but in reality, you will be depressed and bored. That's sometimes a fate worse than weakness. You will also be good at everything else you do, completely unable to escape your greatness.

options.label: Supervillain
options.description: Who ever said you had to go and use your pwoers for good? Go forth and conquer, you have superpowers now. Do what you want, when you want, and kill anyone that disagrees. You will make lots of powerful enemies though, so it might be best to fly under the radar until you have worked out a plan to deal with them.

subcategories.name: Family
subcategories.text:
You finally look up and see Agent Farley asleep, drooling on the table. You gently nudge him awake and indicate you're done. 

"Oh shit kid, sorry I passed out. I've been running on 3 hours of sleep for 2 days now. Anyway, we're almost done. I just need you to pick your new foster family. 

Agent Farley slides you one more folder before passing out again. It's recommended that you maintain your secret identity, but its not required. Pick 1 family

options.label: The School
options.description: You might have trouble adjusting to a regular family, so we will keep you lose. You'll go to Senson Boarding School, near our headquarters in Maine. There are several supers, but the majority of the school are normal. You can come and hang out with me and the boys during breaks and where you need.

options.label: The Jones
options.description: You will probably be sagest with this couple. Dan and Jill are trained CSA agents who can help you master your superhero powers, and they are constantly moving around, Unfortunately, you won't meet many people your age, as you will be home-schooled, but you will get to go on cool missions! They are also not experienced with kids, so they will be winging it day to day.

options.label: The Farsons
options.description: This is a nice big family to join. They live in Chicago, and the parents, John and Marian, are nice and decently well off. Additionally, you will never be lonely, with 2 kids, Sarah and Sam, as well as a teenager, Jossey, to hang out with. We will set you up in a local school or college depending on your age. Unfortunately, only John will know about your power. You might be able to show the rest of the family later, but John thinks they should not know for their own safety. Chicago has rough winters, so pack warm.

options.label: Dale Partsi
options.description: Yes, this woman is named Dale. I wouldn't make fun of her for it though, she doesn't have any powers but she could still probably beat you up. She lives outside Dallas, Texas, and she is very proud of it The weather is nice, taxes low, and people are (usually) polite. Ms. Partsi is a good CSA agent, and she will gladly assist you al over the Lone Star State. Just like with the Farsons we will enroll you in a school and tell everyone your her neice or her kid if you look the part.

options.label: The Metters
options.description: I am sure you have heard of Spectacularman. Good looks, almost invulnerable. Upstanding Citizen? Well, this information must never leave this room, but his real name is Mark Metters. and he is and his wife, Lois Metters, desparately want a kid. They can't have one of their own, but they heard about you, and they are willing to take you in. I am sure you will learn lots from him and his friends, as he is the leader of the Liberty League. More importantly, I cannot think of a safer place than besides his side. He lives in rural New York, within flying distance of the city. Once again, we will put you in school according to your level.

options.label: Little Leviathons
options.description: We will shack you up with the Little Leviathons in Los Angeles. This is one of the most instructional families you can choose, and they are ferociously loyal and funny. You won't even have to go to school here, you will learn inside the tower with the rest of them. You might still want to keep your secret identity secret from teh rest of the world.

options.label: The Washingtons
options.description: Steve and Peggy Washington have wanted a family since they thawed out, and you are their opportunity. They live near D.C although you will probably see more of the country and the world because of Steve's status as General Democracy within the Revengers. They are a bit old fashioned, but they are a loving, solid, family. Once again, we will set you up at a local school.

options.label: The Lopezes
options.description: You may choose this family just for the weather. They are ex-cubans who live in Miami. They will all know about your powers. The parents, Alfonso and Amora are loving and caring. Their kids, Sara and Miguel, are also nice and funny. We will set you up at a kicak school within walking distance of the beach.

options.label: The machers
options.description: Jake Macher is a single father, and his two daughters are both in high school. None of them are supers, but they all are happy to help you. This is because a supervillain killed their mother, and now they won't stop until they are all brought to justice. Both Catherine and Anne will help you integrate into your new school in Phoenix, and the entire family is nice and decently well off. Also, the weather is usually pretty nice in Phoenix and Vegas is pretty close, if you like to gamble.

options.label: The Chatters
options.description: The Chatters are a small, nice family near Seattle. Kyle and Jane, the parents, already have two kids, so they know what they are doing. Unfortunately, only the grandparent Mike, knows about your powers. He has requested that neither the parents nor the kids, Tom and Heddy, find out yet. Mike is a good agent, and he will guide you well. We will set you up in a nice school. Pack a raincoat, the weather sucks.

subcategories.name: Minor Heroes in the area
subcategories.text:
Disclaimer: This is pure flavor text. Selecting anything here is meaningless.

You wake up alone on a private plane which appears to already be flying. In front of you, there's a note and one more folder. 

"Okay kid. I thought it was only fair that I send you in with some knowledge of what you will be facing at your new home." 

"In the folder, there's details on both supers and suspected supervillains in the area. Their secret identities are included so you will recognize them, and you will probably meet some of them on the job, or in the street, or even in the classroom. They will all know each other. None of them know you yet though. 

"Destroy this folder when you are done; can't have it falling into the wrong hands.'"

"Good luck kid. My numbers on the phone are in your pocket. Call me if you have questions, although I might not always be reachable."

options.label: Tim "Tungsten Man" Stork
options.description: This hero is kind of special: He doesn't have a secret identity. Like his father Tony, Tim Stork openly flaunts his genius intellect and specialized hero suit. He goes to school with you, and regularly works with police to solve crimes in your area. He doesn't know who you are, or that you are coming. Also, like his father, he is unbelievably cocky and bossy. If you have to work with him, don't let him get into your head with his little jabs.

options.label: John "Jimbo" Janson
options.description: John is a rather large man and a lineman for your schools football team. He has to hold back though, because he is beyond strong. At night, he roams the street punishing evil doers and exploiting the fact that most fast food restaurants are 24/7. Despite his appearances, he is very nice, and a gentle giant to anyone except criminals and his football opponents. You can recognize him at night because of his size and purple padded suit.

options.label: Brick "Ken" Lee
options.description: Brick is by far the most naturally martially talented boy you will ever meet. He was trained in the far north of Japan and portions of Siberia by the greatest combat masters on Earth. Karate, MMA, Wrestling, he knows it all, and he uses it to great effect. He does not talk much, but loves origami, and he is posing as an exchange student at your school.

options.label: Kama "Potion Mistress" Jones
options.description: Kama is a master of everything injestible. She is an excellent cook, potion maker, and she can paralyze people with a concealed spike on her left thumb. She is best friends with Jimbo, and generally friendly, although she cannot stand Tim Stork. If she knows you, stay on her good side or she might paralyze you and leave you in an uncomfortable spot. She has a nasty habit of playing matchmaker with love potions.

options.label: Gary "Mindfreak" Galfin
options.description: Gary is a partially super, partially mad genius, and mostly moron. e figured out how to combine his power of mind reading, partial mind control, and copious amounts of drugs to extract any and all information, as well as getting someone to do anything he wants. Probably do not sleep around him or you might wake up brainwashed and sore.

subcategories.name: Minor Supervillains suspected to be in your area
subcategories.text: Disclaimer: This is pure flavor text. Selecting anything here is meaningless.

options.label: Chaz Fallera
options.description: Not as much a super villain as he is a serial pest. He shoplifts, burglarizes people, and is a thief for hire. He is good at it too. He can turn invisible which makes him difficult to catch. If you see him while you are working, chase him off his current mission, but you do not have to bring him in. He leads us to more dangerous people in the area. Also, he is a peeping tom. Swing your towel around the bathroom a couple of times before you shower to flush him out if he's there.

options.label: Nikoli Krevchenko
options.description: We do not who know this person is, all we know is that he is the son of a Russian mobster, about your age actually, aiming to make an empire in America. He seems to be juiced up on Super Serum, so he is unnaturally strong, fast, and smart. If you somehow figure out his identity, do not engage. Back off and get help from other supers and call me. No one has ever confirmed his identity and survived.

options.label: The Catfish
options.description: The Catfish is a strange, ugly creature that has thrive with the rise of online dating apps. He seduces young people and drags them into his lair. The unspeakable acts that follow entitle this creature to a life in prison. Try to catch this beast before he can hurt anyone else.

options.label: The General
options.description: A man with no known motivations besides causing chaos with his private militia he calls "The Corps." He robs banks, deals drugs, dabbles in human trafficking, and is a prolific arms dealer. The general has a hand in it all, and he is slowly tearing the community and its guardians apart.

options.label: Specimen-X-042
options.description: A strange creature that lurks underground, in the mines, sewers, and drainage pipes of the city. It escaped a lab almost a month ago and it has attempted to reproduce several times. It is infertile but that does not stop it from trying and hurting several people. It is incredibly dangerous and it is recommended that you try to trap it and call for help from other supers. Don't get captured.

subcategories.name: Major superheroes in your area
subcategories.text: Available option is dependent on family selection

options.label: Headmaster
options.description: The headmaster is not powered, but he knows who you are and who every super in the school is. We at the CSA trust him to keep your secret, but he is kind of a bully. Do not get on his bad side and you should be fine.

options.label: Nick Furious
options.description: Not a super, but powerful and intimidating, He is one of the leaders of the CSA, and he keeps the supers in line. The Liberty League. The Revengers, even the all-powerful Mercosur South American Trade Agreement. They all fear and respect Furious. You will probably be his helper, finding vigilantes and lone supers.

options.label: Darkest Knight
options.description: A superhero that notoriously doesn't work well with others. Darkest night will probably make a plan or kill you about meeting you, or he might already have made one, depending on how recently he hacked into the CSA servers. He is a major player in the liberty league, but he spends most of his time in Chicago. With enough time, you might get him to warm up to you, but you will mostly be working with the minor super superheroes.

options.label: Jimmy Gate
options.description: What hero could represent Texas better than a man that fought in the Texas revolution? He got shot at the Alamo and promptly fell into a cave, where he got frozen. He eventually thawed out even stronger and more super than he already was. He now spends his time protecting the good citizens of Texas and cursing the name of Santa Anna wherever he goes. Do not try to take his Six-Shooter or his brand new level action rifle.

options.label: Spectacularman
options.description: Spectacularman is quite possibly the most powerful hero in the world, and he deals with the most menacing threats. He is the leader of the Liberty League and guardian of New York City. He will personally train you extensively, and if he thinks you are ready, he will bring you on some missions.

options.label: Little Leviathons
options.description: Pretty obvious, The Little Leviathons are the guardians of Los Angeles. You will have a close relationship with all of them, as you will be an actual Leviathon. They are not really professional about their heroics, though it is a tower full of hormonal teens, good luck getting them to do anything well Nick Furious himself has to come by every once in a while to scare them into not getting each other pregnant.

options.label: General Democracy
options.description: The spirit of the United States, who fought the Nazis or more specifically M.E.D.U.S.S.A during WW2. He will keep fighting for the country now that he has thawed out. He serves near Washington, but is deployed all over the world. He is a notable part of the Revengers, competing with Tony Stork for the title of leader

options.label: Aqua Hombre
options.description: Aquahombre is a sleeping powerhouse who can control water, and most of the creatures are it. He swims with the dolphins, chills with the squids, and fights sharks. He works pretty well with other heroes if they also operate in water. He is an important part of the liberty league serving as their main water combatant.

options.label: The Red Star
options.description: This Russian superhero emerged from the collapse of the USSR with one thing on his mind, going to warmer territory. He eventually settled in Phoenix, where he is popular and loved, despite his thick accent and ideals about communism. He has definitely chilled out on the ideology enough to do corporate sponsorships, though, notably for Adidas and certain vodka producers.

options.label: Wonderful Woman
options.description: Wonderful Woman is possibly the most popular superhero in the world, due in large part to her successful managing of social media. She has her own stands, a popular YouTube channel, and an OF account. She also has a constant strings of boyfriends and girlfriends. If you are lucky, she might spot you from her invisible helicopter and give you a shot. She is also one of the founding members of the liberty league and possible ex of spectacular man.

subcategories.name: Super Teams
subcategories.text: Disclaimer: This is pure flavor text. Selecting anything here is meaningless.

options.label: The Revengers
options.description: A popular and powerful team that mostly operates from the United States. Notable members include Tony Stork (Steel Man) General Washington, The Bulk, Mars, Black Mantis, and Birdeye. There are also several other honorary members who help from time to time. They are controversial, because they seem to operate as an American force, with several members fighting in Afghanistan. Both Mantis and Birdeye are ex-CSA agents and still do work for the agency, Unofficially, the CSA does have lots of influence within the team, with Nick Furious having built it himself. This team has a massive competition with the Liberty League and they rarely work together, unless the situation is truly apocalyptic.

options.label: The Liberty League
options.description: And arguably even more powerful team than The Revengers, The Liberty League is constantly in competition with them. It operates much more loosely, though, with most of its heroes guarding their own city, only coming together occasionally they have several notable members: Spectacularman, Wonderful Woman, Darkest Knight, Aquahombre, The Flash, Rhodesian Manhunter, and finally Pink Lantern. It has way more members but once again, the league's loose structure prevents regular mass cooperation. The CSA has little influence here, so to get in, you would have to suck up to a current member.

subcategories.name: Location
subcategories.text:
You finally look up and see Agent Farley asleep, drooling on the table. You gently nudge him awake and indicate you're done. 

"Oh shit, sorry I passed out. I've been running on 3 hours of sleep for 2 days now. Anyway, we're almost done. I just need you to pick your new foster family. 

Agent Farley slides you one more folder before passing out again. It's recommended that you maintain your secret identity, but its not required. Pick 1 location

options.label: Denver, Colorado
options.description: This is a nice, relatively safe environment for you to learn your new powers. You will be able to study under Mars, if you want and more importantly, if he likes you. Additionally, the weather is not all that bad, and there is skiing in the area, as well as other entertainment. If you impress them, Mars may even get you into the Revengers.

options.label: Freton, Maine
options.description: This is less of a superhero deal and more of a training experience. This is the location of the CSA headquarters, and it is packed full of experts to help you become the best possible. We can surely find work for you, and even send you admissions around the world once we think you are ready.

options.label: Minneapolis, Minnesota
options.description: This is an opportunity to work under one of the founders of the Liberty League, Rhodesian Manhunter, and to possibly gain an in to the organization. We are the CSSA will help you with us. Please remember that if you get in, the Liberty League has always been more hostile to us than the Revengers, and now they are icing us out even further. Nick Furious is furious, you could be our man on the inside. Don't get us wrong, we will not ask you to do anything unheroic just keep us informed.

options.label: El Paso, Texas
options.description: This is less an opportunity to patrol city, and more an opportunity to a region. You will work with The Hawk to respond to threats in West Texas, New Mexico, and parts of North Mexico, across the Rio Grande. Some knowledge of Spanish is recommended, and some ability to fly or move around quickly is required. Additionally, The Hawk is a member of The Revengers, although not a mainliner, and he could probably get you in if you impress him. Watch your back in Juarez, even superheroes have trouble fighting cartels.

options.label: New York City, New York,
options.description: This is one of the largest cities in the US and even the world. It is filled to the brim with C-list, B-list, and even A-list supers. Notably, Spectacularman represents the area. Additionally, smaller heroes like Spiderkid and Balloon Boy represent Burroughs and neighborhoods in a competitive, constant battle for popular support. With heroes,, villains, and New York has some bad ones. Dex Duther is the sworn enemy of Spectacularman and Hitler 2 is a general menace to everyone. New York City is a place to make your name, either as an apprentice or an independent. Fame and success it's not guaranteed, but they are common.

options.label: San Fransisco, California
options.description: This is a pretty nice place to fight crime. The weather is always great, the job's high pain, and the villains plentiful. Unfortunately, this is also difficult place to live. Sometimes there are homeless people everywhere, people are rude in general, and you might have to deal with powerful political and corporate opponents, who are sometimes more dangerous than any psycho.

options.label: Washington D.C.
options.description: This is the place to be if you want to make friends in high places. Politicians, CEOs, and every other kind of leader are all here. If you do try to earn favors and build your own little network, try to be fair about it. General Democracy has a very strict, moral code and blackmailing anyone might earn a beating. Additionally, this is a bad place to make enemies. They could destroy in other ways.

options.label: Miami, Florida
options.description: Like California, but way more humid. This place has great weather, great beaches, and great parties but, unfortunately, it also has a lot of villains. Some of them are involved in cartels, making the situation more difficult. Either way, expect to work on the ocean and in the Everglades.

options.label: Seattle, Washington
options.description: This place has far from the best weather, but it makes up for insights, job, opportunities, and the culture. The villains almost contribute to this culture in their own way. There's half crab monsters, terrifying, intelligent, bears, and rogue Canadian bank robbers, coming to make a quick buckif you are not careful, this place will spit you out, but under the watchful guidance of Doctor Unusual, you will thrive. Additionally, the good doctor can get you into both the Revengers and certain magical circles if you impress him.

options.label: Anywhere
options.description: In most places, you would be an apprentice, slowly learning, but perhaps you would like to learn things on your own. The CSA will not stop you. You could go anywhere, do anything. As long as it is not filling us, we will not I'll even bother you. Good luck if you ever need some help, give us a call and explain the situation, but I am sure with you're still set, you can accomplish more things without us holding your hand.

subcategories.name: Jobs
subcategories.text:
Farley slides you another folder.

"We will give you the necessary education to complete the job as well as I made up resume if you want it. You are sure to find a job wherever you go."

options.label: Secret Identity Jobs
options.description: Jobs that allow you the option of keeping a secret identity. Important if you do not want your family murdered or kidnapped. Could be anything that most people do: office work, government jobs, or any blue collar shop will do. This can even include some strange ones, like being a doctor. The point is, most people would ignore you. Spectacularman works for the news, you could do something similar. This is the most open ended and safest option.

options.label: Risky Jobs
options.description: This is the option for anyone smart enough to become rich, but who will still want to keep a secret. You could be an entrepreneur or a great doctor during the day, superhero at night. It is suspected darkest night does this, though we do not know fully. You can also probably ditch the secret right here if you wanted, but once again, that is risky. Villains may target your family or kill you while you sleep. At this level, you probably do not have enough power to guard everything you love.

options.label: No secret needed
options.description: Add this level, you have enough power/gall to live life without a secret. This could be anyone public like a secret millionaire, or a popular influencer. You can openly use your powers and exploit them to gain a following and support of millions of people. They will respect you more than others because they can see your face, and to a certain extent, trust you. Watch out for your family and paparazzi.

options.label: Higher Paying
options.description: You are higher paid than most people in your chosen field are. This can be as high as 25% higher or 50% if you have charismatic.

options.label: Lower Hours
options.description: You finish your work early, you can go home sooner  up to 2 hours early, or up to 6 hours early if you have super-speed.

options.label: Fast Promotions
options.description: Something about you impresses your bosses. They can't get enough of you, and so you can climb the ranks of your job faster.

options.label: Gifted
options.description: You can earn favors on the job by helping your boss with a 'special task.' Don't push it too hard or your boss may fire you.

options.label: Understanding
options.description: Your superiors, or more likely inferiors, will understand your need to leave work early to help people and they will do your work for you. Don't skip multiple days though, people can only do so much.

options.label: Unemployed By Choice
options.description: You are wealthy and smart enough that you don't even need to work. You can appoint people to do your work for you. Obviously, this does not work if you are an actor or something, because the job relies on you.

options.label: More Holidays
options.description: You get more days around holidays for extra long breaks. Most villains take Christmas off, so you can relax.

options.label: Alternative Income
options.description: You run a camshow on the side, easy money, no need to show your face.

subcategories.name: Introduction
subcategories.text:
You look to Agent Farley, who is again asleep and nudge him awake. 

"You ready? Jeez, took you long enough. I'm just kidding. I know it's stressful picking a new job and all. Well, alright then. We will get you trained up for you new job for the next couple of days, and we will inform the supers in the region about you."

"But first, you have got to get some rest. If you ever need help after this, give me a call. My number will be in your new phone. I will pick up sometimes." 

You feel another sharp pinch in your neck, and suddenly, the world seems heavy and dark. You fall into a deep dreamless sleep.

You were walking to your new home after another day of settling in. You have spent two days getting to know the area and beginning to understand your new power suddenly, on the shadowy corner, a tall woman with white and green dress and a small pink purse strides towards you. 

"Oh hello there, sweetie. I am agent Lindsay from the CSA, and I am here to help you out. Do not worry, your new friends are not expecting you for a while. We have a couple of hours to design a new outfit." 

Agent Lindsay have drugs, have lead you to a small stylish convertible. Once you are in and buckled up, the engine roars, and 10 minutes later, you have pulled into a small laundromat.

"Welcome to one of my many workstations. If you ever need repairs to your outfit, come here, and pay the allotted credits. You are in them pretty regularly, about five per week, but expensive repairs or replacements can only be done occasionally with your SC earning speed."

"You already have 70 SC in your account, mostly because of the initiate bonus." that will be enough for pretty decent outfit. You can always upgrade it later if you do heroic enough things or save it up enough."

subcategories.name: Lower Layer
subcategories.text: Lets start with your lower layer. This will go beneath any armor.

options.label: Regular Clothes
options.description: Really? Ok. I guess it's cheap and easily put on. Additionally, it might help you out escape in a tough spot by blending into a crowd. Also gives you more relatable look.

options.label: Cloth
options.description: A bulky cloth jumpsuit that offers some protection, but does not look that stylish. I hope you have something over this. Also gets pretty hot and swampy in the heat.

options.label: Latex Suit
options.description: All right, now we are getting places. This is a tight and adorable suit that shows all your curves if you travel with light armor. Pretty cheap to repair as well.

options.label: Durex Suit
options.description: Now, this is a super suit. It is strong and stylish. It will not stop a bullet, but it might stop a knife. Maybe don't wear upper armor with this. Show off a bit.

subcategories.name: Middle Layer
subcategories.text: Now, let's move onto your middle layer. This is the highest a lot of heroes go, unless they plan on taking some hits.

options.label: Backpack
options.description: This is incredibly useful for blending into crowds. It is perfect to store your entire outfit for a quick response, even at school at work.

options.label: middleLayerTacticalVest
options.description: Stores quite a bit, while also providing lots of protection. Difficult to store and blend in though.

options.label: Exosuit
options.description: You can wear an excel suit, that provides power and protection. You are going to have to build your own.

subcategories.name: Outer Layer
subcategories.text: Finally, let's move onto your shell, if you want one

options.label: Suit of plates
options.description: You are now wearing a complex system for holding ballistic plates, extremely protective

options.label: Elemental Armor
options.description: You make your own shell on the field, out of whatever you control.

options.label: Tech Suit
options.description: You shall will be your own tech suit, that is or enhances your powers. Helped significantly by exosuit.

subcategories.name: Finishing Touches
subcategories.text: Finally, let's put on the flashing touches. Pick your colors, symbols, and once you're done, choose some of these extra parts pick three.

options.label: Hoodie
options.description: Fire and damage resistant, while looking normal. It's a great way to blend in or hide your face.

options.label: Eye Mask
options.description: This is a simple mask for your eyes. You choose to shape and color. Great for covering noticeable features.

options.label: Gator
options.description: A simple mask over the lower portion of your face, excellent at hiding noticeable features, but can be pulled off relatively easily,

options.label: Full Face Mask
options.description: A mask that combines skater and eye masks. Difficult to pull off. Can come with possible voice alterer.

options.label: Cape
options.description: A dangerous but stylish choice, probably don't choose it unless you are very confident

options.label: Nice Boots
options.description: A very nice shoe portion of the outfit. Does not slip on ice or sink too much in mind. A hero's shoe.

options.label: Extra Armor
options.description: Clunky and slow knee and elbow pads. Useful for combat keyboarding, and not much else.

options.label: Fire Retardant
options.description: An extra layer of fire defense, not heavy, but won't save you from smoke or heat

options.label: Comfortable
options.description: Your suit is now comfortable enough to sleep in if you wanted to

options.label: More pockets
options.description: Just generally useful, select 1 more gadget in the next selection.

options.label: Useful Openings
options.description: Your suit has a convenient flap or hole near the groin area that allows you to use the bathroom or do other things.

options.label: Jarkis
options.description: The Jarkis AI is inbuilt into your suit. He is incredibly useful, providing information and assistance. You can already access him on your phone, but this is easier.

options.label: Foldable
options.description: Not really necessary if your outfit consists of normal clothes, but this allows more complex suits to be folded down and contained easier.

options.label: Good Gloves
options.description: You have a nice pair of gloves that protects from heat and does not leave fingerprints. Also does not inhibit sense of touch.

options.label: Holster
options.description: If your powers rely on a particular gadget like a gun or a staff, you will have an inbuilt stylish and easy to access holster to put it in.

options.label: Scrambler
options.description: Your suit has an inbuilt machine that blurs your face to any cameras in the area.

options.label: Nice Underwear
options.description: A couple nice pairs of socks, underwear, and general undergarments. Both comfortable and sexy if thats what you are going for.

options.label: Better Contacts
options.description: You have better pair of contacts that never dry out, tear, or fall out of your eyes unless you want them to. Can interface with Jarkis if you want them too.

options.label: Better Glasses
options.description: A solid pair of glasses that are almost invulnerable and immune to falling off. Can also interface with Jarkis. Changes shape if you want different styles for civilian life and superhero life.

options.label: Poison Protection
options.description: Your suit provides moderate protection from poisons, bacteria, viruses, and anything else that might hurt you in the field. When combined with full face mask, it's almost as effective as a bio-hazard suit, without losing mobility or effectiveness.

options.label: Custom Upgrade
options.description: Add your own flair to your suit. You might have to be smart to pull it off. Can be combined with your powers for an even more effective suit.

subcategories.name: Gadgets
subcategories.text: Alright, now that your suit is all ready, let's work on your gadgets: Pick 3 or 4 if you have more pockets.

options.label: Your Own Weapon
options.description: Weapon of your design that amplifiers or create your powers. Can be a staff, gun, or anything.

options.label: Your own special equipment
options.description: Some equipment of your own design. Could be a shield, grenade, or anything else shut

options.label: CSA Grenades
options.description: A collection of standard issue of CSA grenades. Come in flash, high, explosive, fire, and smoke form. Once you have them, you can make or buy more.

options.label: CSA Energy Bars
options.description: CSA bars, like a meal in wrapper, useful for stakeouts or hiding.

options.label: Emergency Pack
options.description: A small kit of important small tools to help you, like a pocket knife, some string, and a mini fire starter.

options.label: Tracker
options.description: Locator in your suit that displays your current or last non-coordinates to the CSA, and your teammates, if you choose. Small, but present risk of hacking.

options.label: Better Phone
options.description: Your phone, while looking regular, will be faster and more Jarkis integrated, allowing for things like charging stoplight, color or disabling security

options.label: Snitchers
options.description: Five standard issues, CSA trackers that stick to cars, walls, or anything else. If you run out, you can make or buy more.

options.label: Assorted Potions
options.description: The CSA will give you several assorted potions to help with superhero work. If you have some magical ability, we will train you to make more or you can get some from your team.

options.label: Spellbook
options.description: The CSA will give you a small spell book to read from if you have some magical ability

options.label: Better Computer
options.description: Your desktop or laptop will be faster and more integrated with Jarkis. Both efficient and fun.

options.label: Magical Weapon
options.description: There is a wide assortment of magical weapons within CSA storerooms. Pick one.

options.label: Drone
options.description: Speedy and stealthy drone for infiltration and tracking. Can be replaced or fixed once per six months.

options.label: Bug out bag
options.description: If you're home or layers ever overrun, you can go to an appointed location to get some weapons, food, and money

options.label: Hunter
options.description: A Jarkis powered gadget will scour the Internet, hunt for rumors of your name and face, and delete them. One of the most efficient identity hiders.

options.label: Tasserent
options.description: This is a small mini reactor that can power a city block. You can use it to power, your homemade gadgets and suits easily, without drawing notice.

options.label: Parrot
options.description: A small grenade that makes any noise you want where it lands, be it gunshots, a villains voice, or a dog whistle. Useful distraction or combat strategy.

options.label: Force Field Generator
options.description: A catcher that creates a small nearly impervious bubbles that can shelter several people for up to an hour. Can even protect from a falling building.

options.label: Weiller
options.description: A small gadget that runs from your breast to your elbow that allows for the enhancement of telekinetic abilities, giving you the ability to make energy shapes like walls

options.label: Quick Disguise Kit
options.description: A small kit, able to be applied in 30 seconds, that changes, hair color, eye color, and even voice inflection. Can be washed off in the shower.

options.label: Beauty Care Kit
options.description: A kit containing an everlasting razor and a weekly delivery of several beauty, creams, and hair products

options.label: Massager
options.description: A personal massager for your own personal use. Helps you to relax after a long day work. Probably find a good hiding place for it. This CSA issued one is better than any other on the market.

options.label: Stingfruit
options.description: If you prick someone with this, it will grow into an identical copy of them that lives for a day and is completely obedient to you. You get one per year, and this cost 2 gadget slots.

subcategories.name: Lindsey's speech
subcategories.text:
After an exhausting 5 hours, the design is complete. Agent Lindsey has only seemed to grow more excited throughout the entire process. 

"Alright, it should be relatively easy to make your suit. I will get it to you in 2 days, don't worry about measurements. I have been staring at you for a while now and I have a good eye for these things. Try not to get the suit damaged too much. You only make so much SC per week, and if you do not have enough, I will have to leave you without clothing.

options.label: No vehicle
options.description: You either do not want or need a custom vehicle. Honestly, a good option if you have some other option for mobility, like flight. It is way cheaper to not have to repair or fuel the massive tactical machine.

options.label: Car
options.description: You have four wheeled automobiles in this category. Probably the most varied options, as it can be anything from an ATV to an APC. Does not have to be tactical looking. You can have a sports car with inbuilt superhero features.

options.label: Bike
options.description: This is any two (or three) wheeled option. Great for both mobility and blending in, if you pick something like a dirtbike. Can also be something like Darkest Knights motorcycle. You cannot go wrong with this category. Don't fall off.

options.label: Boat
options.description: Probably more useful in coastal regions. A boat is a great and fast mobility option on water. You boat can either be a regular boat, jet ski, or even submarine. There's a surprising depth of choices.

options.label: Helicopter
options.description: A fragile, yet incredibly useful tool for urban movement. All the short range mobility of a plane, with the ability to land on command. Probably don't attempt a landing under fire, and stay away from the blades.

options.label: Jet
options.description: Expensive, fast, and efficient. Jets, or planes in general, are the best option for long range movement. Difficult to land safely though.

options.label: Tank
options.description: A machine built for fighting. Very difficult to maneuver and hide, but probably the best vehicle for combat. Good luck, keeping this thing secret.
